name: gdc-client
description: The Genomic Data Commons Command Line Client

options.description: show this help message and exit
show program's version number and exit

subcommands.name: download
subcommands.usage: gdc-client download [-h] [--debug] [--log-file LOG_FILE] [--color_off] [-t TOKEN_FILE] [-d DIR] [-s server] [--no-segment-md5sums] [--no-file-md5sum] [-n N_PROCESSES] [--http-chunk-size HTTP_CHUNK_SIZE] [--save-interval SAVE_INTERVAL] [-k] [--no-related-files] [--no-annotations] [--no-auto-retry] [--retry-amount RETRY_AMOUNT] [--wait-time WAIT_TIME] [--latest] [--config FILE] [-m MANIFEST] [file_id [file_id ...]]

options.description: show this help message and exit
Enable debug logging. If a failure occurs, the program will stop.
Save logs to file. Amount logged affected by --debug
Disable colored output
GDC API auth token file
Directory to download files to. Defaults to current directory
The TCP server address server[:port]
Do not calculate inbound segment md5sums and/or do not verify md5sums on restart
Do not verify file md5sum after download
Number of client connections.
Size in bytes of standard HTTP block size.
The number of chunks after which to flush state file. A lower save interval will result in more frequent printout but lower performance.
Perform insecure SSL connection and transfer
Do not download related files.
Do not download annotations.
Ask before retrying to download a file
Number of times to retry a download
Amount of seconds to wait before retrying
Download latest version of a file if it exists
Path to INI-type config file
GDC download manifest file

subcommands.name: upload
subcommands.usage: gdc-client upload [-h] [--debug] [--log-file LOG_FILE] [--color_off] [-t TOKEN_FILE] [--project-id PROJECT_ID] [--path path] [--upload-id UPLOAD_ID] [--insecure] [--server SERVER] [--part-size PART_SIZE] [--upload-part-size UPLOAD_PART_SIZE] [-n N_PROCESSES] [--disable-multipart] [--abort] [--resume] [--delete] [--manifest MANIFEST] [--config FILE] [file_id [file_id ...]]

options.description: show this help message and exit
Enable debug logging. If a failure occurs, the program will stop.
Save logs to file. Amount logged affected by --debug
Disable colored output
GDC API auth token file
The project ID that owns the file
directory path to find file
Multipart upload id
Allow connections to server without certs
GDC API server address
DEPRECATED in favor of [--upload-part-size]
Part size for multipart upload
Number of client connections
Disable multipart upload
Abort previous multipart upload
Resume previous multipart upload
Delete an uploaded file
Manifest which describes files to be uploaded
Path to INI-type config file
show this help message and exit
Path to INI-type config file. See what settings will look like if a custom config file is used
